scripts.build:css: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 index.scss -o css/
scripts.build:icon: yarn run clean:icon && mkdirp packages/de-code-icons/fonts && mkdirp packages/de-code-icons/css && cp icons/fonts/* packages/de-code-icons/fonts/ && cp icons/css/style.css packages/de-code-icons/css/de-code-icons.css
scripts.clean:icon: mkdirp tmp && mv packages/de-code-icons/*.json packages/de-code-icons/*.md tmp && rm -rf packages/de-code-icons/ && mkdirp packages/de-code-icons && mv tmp/* packages/de-code-icons/ && rm -rf tmp
scripts.publish:docs: yarn run docz:build && gh-pages -d dist -b gh-pages -r https://github.com/mayadata-io/de-code
